Homepage.name: roman maliska
Homepage.intro: Hello, world! I'm a front-end developer who speaks JavaScript as fluently as my native language. I craft interactive web experiences with the power of React, turning complex problems into beautiful, simple code.
Homepage.nature: When I'm not in front of a screen, you'll find me in the great outdoors, savoring a cup of coffee and admiring the beauty of nature.
Homepage.welcome: So whether you're here for some React wizardry or just to share a virtual cup of coffee, I'm glad you stopped by. Welcome to my corner of the internet!

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch
ContactPage.subjectTooShort: Subject must be at least 2 characters
ContactPage.messageTooShort: Message must be at least 10 characters
